column4: hi all. I installed an Ubuntu derivative called easypeasy, which is built upon Intrepid, on a netbook (Acer Aspire One 110) and while in the live environment the wlan card worked, but after install it just didn't. I don't know if this is an issue with Ubuntu 8.10, can somebody confirm if it is?
ok your using easypeasy right now?
no not right now. I'm on my normal laptop now.
PM me and I can probably help
